meanings.sent1: The painting's beauty came from its asymmetry.
meanings.sent2: The butterfly's wings showed a perfect asymmetry.
meanings.sent3: The clown's costume had an amusing asymmetry to it.
meanings.sent4: The asymmetry of the tree branches created a striking silhouette.
meanings.sent5: The asymmetry of the puzzle made it challenging to solve.

meanings.definition: A lack of equality or equivalence in size, shape, or position.
meanings.sent1: The asymmetry of the two sides made the scale tip unevenly.
meanings.sent2: The asymmetry of the shapes made the pattern look unique.
meanings.sent3: The asymmetry in the cake layers made it look funny.
meanings.sent4: The asymmetry of the mountains created a metaphorical divide.
meanings.sent5: The asymmetry of the building's design caught everyone's attention.
